resources.string: The 2020 Olympic Games were held in Seattle
First modern Olympic games were organized in 1796
There were 40 sports disciplines at the 2020 Olympic games
Women were allowed to participate in the Olympics since 1900
Gold medals are made of 50% gold
Michael Phelps is the athlete with the most Olympic medals
Men and women do not compete against each other in any sport
Swimming obstacle race was Olympic discipline at one Game
